changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE "organization_invite" ( "id" UUID NOT NULL, "ts" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), "created_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NOT NULL DEFAULT NOW(), "code" CHAR(6) NOT NULL, "email" VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, "role" VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, "status" VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL, "expires_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NOT NULL, "accepted_at" TIMESTAMPTZ(3) NULL, "organization_id" UUID NOT NULL, "creator_account_id" UUID NOT NULL, -- PRIMARY KEY ("id"), FOREIGN KEY ("organization_id") REFERENCES "organization" ("id") ON DELETE CASCADE, FOREIGN KEY ("creator_account_id") REFERENCES "account" ("id") ON DELETE CASCADE, UNIQUE ("code") ); CREATE INDEX "idx_organization_invite_creator_account_id" ON "organization_invite" ("creator_account_id"); CREATE INDEX "idx_organization_invite_organization_pending" ON "organization_invite" ("organization_id") WHERE "accepted_at" IS NULL;
